blogPost.excerpt: Can't find the right words to start a conversation? We have used GPT-3 to generate dozens of thousands of Tinder openers and picked the best of them (according to our limited experience).
blogPost.body: Can't find the right words to start a conversation? We have used GPT-3 to generate dozens of thousands of Tinder openers and picked the best of them (according to our limited experience).
blogPost.title: +500 Openers for Tinder written by GPT-3 - GPT-3 generated thousands of openers & we picked the best
blogPost.author: Jan A. Kolar

localize.description: 找不到合适的开场白？我们使用GPT-3生成了数万条Tinder开场白，并从中挑选出最好的开场白（根据我们有限的经验）。
localize.tagline: GPT-3产生了数以千计的打开器，我们挑选了最好的打开器。

localize.description: 找不到合適的開場白？我們使用GPT-3生成了數萬條Tinder開場白，並從中挑選出最好的開場白（根據我們有限的經驗）。
localize.tagline: GPT-3產生了數以千計的打開器，我們挑選了最好的打開器。

previous.excerpt: Macro helps teams supercharge their manual and repetitive processes. Our powerful checklist allows teams to quickly document processes, assign tasks, track progress, and automate common actions.
previous.title: Macro - Supercharge your team’s processes

localize.description: Macro帮助团队超额完成人工和重复性流程。我们强大的核对表使团队能够快速记录流程、分配任务、跟踪进度，并将常见的操作自动化。
localize.tagline: 为您的团队流程注入活力

localize.description: Macro幫助團隊超額完成人工和重複性流程。我們強大的核對錶使團隊能夠快速記錄流程、分配任務、跟蹤進度，並將常見的操作自動化。
localize.tagline: 爲您的團隊流程注入活力

next.title:
At $7.72 trillion, the Fed's Balance Sheet hit another new high this week.

The Fed's total assets have increased $3.55 trillion since the beginning of 2020 and they have promised to keep buying bonds at a rate of $120 billion per month going forward. https://t.co/MMvWqU9Nne

localize.full_text:
7.72万亿美元，美联储资产负债表本周再创新高。

自2020年初以来，美联储的总资产增加了3.55万亿美元，他们承诺未来将以每月1200亿美元的速度继续购买债券。https://t.co/MMvWqU9Nne。

7.72萬億美元，美聯儲資產負債表本週再創新高。

自2020年初以來，美聯儲的總資產增加了3.55萬億美元，他們承諾未來將以每月1200億美元的速度繼續購買債券。https://t.co/MMvWqU9Nne。
